summary: Internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing a media inquiry about FBI agents returning to Jeffrey Epstein's mansion on July 11, 2019. The email shows the office declining to comment on the reported search activity.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses FBI agents returning to his mansion, indicating ongoing investigation activities related to him.

events.title: FBI search at Epstein mansion
events.description: About a dozen FBI agents in jackets were reported to be back at Jeffrey Epstein's mansion at around 2:50 PM.

locations: Epstein mansion (location unspecified but referenced as 'the mansion')
keyFacts: On July 11, 2019, approximately a dozen FBI agents were reported to be at Jeffrey Epstein's mansion around 2:50 PM.
The Wall Street Journal received a tip about this FBI activity and contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office for comment.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York declined to comment on the reported search.
The email shows internal coordination within the Department of Justice regarding media inquiries about the Epstein investigation.
